thread.title: Schumer: Ryan Should ‘Replace’ Nunes as Intel Chair
thread.title_full: Schumer: Ryan Should ‘Replace’ Nunes as Intel Chair

author: Pam Key
title: Schumer: Ryan Should ‘Replace’ Nunes as Intel Chair
text: Monday on the Senate floor, Minority Leader Sen. Charles Schumer (D-NY) called on Speaker of the House Paul Ryan (R-WI) to replace Rep. Devin Nunes (R-CA) as House Intelligence Committee chairman. Schumer said, “Chairman Nunes is falling down on the job and seems to be more interested in protecting the president than in seeking the truth. You cannot have the person in charge of an impartial investigation be partial to one side. It’s an inherent contradiction.” He added, “Without further ado, Speaker Ryan should replace Chairman Nunes.” (h/t The Hill) Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
